inlineScript: function onApply(game, parent) { var effect = parent.createEffect(); effect.getBonuses().addWeaponAttackBonus('Piercing', 'Stackable', 10); parent.applyEffect(effect); }
name: Piercing Weapons Training
description: You gain an additional +10 to attack with all Piercing weapons, including daggers, short swords, and spears.
